Verses: 1 yoseppu Egipthukkuk Kondupogappattaan. Paarvonudaiya Piradhaaniyum Thalaiyaarigalukku Adhipadhiyumaagiya Poththipaar Ennum Egipthu Dhesaththaan Avanai Avvidaththirkuk Konduvandha Ismavelaridaththil Vilaikku Vaanginaan.
2 karththar Yoseppode Irundhaar, Avan Kaariyasiththiyullavanaanaan; Avan Egipthiyanaagiya Than Ejamaanudaiya Veettile Irundhaan.
3 karththar Avanode Irukkiraar Endrum, Avan Seygira Yaavaiyum Karththar Vaaikkappannukiraar Endrum, Avan Ejamaan Kandu:
4 yoseppinidaththil Dhayavuvaiththu, Avanaith Thanakku Oozhiyakkaaranum Than Veettukku Visaaranaikkaaranumaakki, Thanakku Undaana Yaavatraiyum Avan Kaiyil Oppuviththaan.

5  Avanaith Than Veettukkum Thanakku Undaana Ellaavatrirkum Visaaranaikkaaranaakkinadhumudharkondu, Karththar Yoseppinimiththam Andha Egipthiyan Veettai Aaseervadhiththaar; Veettilum Veliyilum Avanukku Undaanavaigal Ellaavatrilum Karththarudaiya Aaseervaadham Irundhadhu.

6 aagaiyaal, Avan Thanakku Undaanadhaiyellaam Yoseppin Kaiyile Oppukkoduththuvittu, Thaan Pusikkira Pojanamdhavira Thannidaththilirundha Matrondraikkuriththum Visaariyaadhirundhaan. Yoseppu Azhagaana Roopamum Sowndhariya Mugamum Ullavanaayirundhaan.
7 silanaal Sendrapin, Avanudaiya Ejamaanin Manaivi Yoseppinmel Kanpottu, Ennode Sayani Endraal.

8 avano Than Ejamaanudaiya Manaiviyin Sollukku Inangaamal, Avalai Nokki: Idho, Veettile Ennidaththil Irukkiravaigalil Yaadhondraikkuriththum En Aandavan Visaariyaamal, Thamakku Undaana Ellaavatraiyum En Kaiyil Oppuviththirukkiraar.

9 indha Veettile Ennilum Periyavan Illai; Nee Avarudaiya Manaiviyaayirukkirapadiyaal Unnaiththavira Verondraiyum Avar Enakku Vilakki Vaikkavillai; Ippadiyirukka, Naan Iththanai Periya Pollaangukku Udanpattu, Dhevanukku Virodhamaaip Paavam Seyvadhu Eppadi Endraan.
10 aval Niththam Niththam Yoseppode Ippadip Pesikkonduvandhum, Avan Avaludane Sayanikkavum Avaludane Irukkavum Sammadhikkavillai.
11  Ippadiyirukkumpodhu, Orunaal Avan Than Velaiyaich Seygiradharku Veettukku Ponaan; Veettu Manidharil Oruvarum Veettil Illai.
12  Appozhudhu Aval Avanudaiya Vasthiraththaip Patrip Pidiththu, Ennode Sayani Endraal. Avano Than Vasthiraththai Aval Kaiyile Vittu Veliye Odipponaan.
13 avan Than Vasthiraththai Aval Kaiyile Vittu Veliye Odipponadhai Aval Kandapodhu,

14 aval Than Veettu Manidharaik Kooppittu: Paarungal, Ebireya Manushan Nammidaththil Sarasampannumpadikku Avanai Namakkul Konduvandhaar, Avan Ennode Sayanikkumpadikku Ennidaththil Vandhaan; Naan Migundha Saththamittuk Kooppitten.
15 naan Saththamittuk Kooppidugiradhai Avan Kettu, Than Vasthiraththai Ennidaththil Vittu, Veliye Odippoivittaan Endru Sonnaal.
16 avanudaiya Ejamaan Veettukku Varumalavum Avanudaiya Vasthiraththaith Thannidaththil Vaiththirundhu,
17 avanai Nokki: Neer Nammidaththil Konduvandha Andha Ebireya Velaikkaaran Sarasampannumpadikku Ennidaththil Vandhaan.
18 appozhudhu Naan Saththamittuk Kooppitten, Avan Than Vasthiraththai Ennidaththil Vittu Veliye Odipponaan Endraal.
19 ummudaiya Velaikkaaran Enakku Ippadich Seydhaan Endru Than Manaivi Thannode Sonna Vaarththaigalai Avanudaiya Ejamaan Kettapodhu, Avanukkuk Kopam Moondadhu.
20 yoseppin Ejamaan Avanaip Pidiththu, Raajaavin Kattalaiyaal Kaavalil Vaikkappattavargal Irukkum Siraichchaalaiyile Avanai Oppuviththaan. Andhach Siraichchaalaiyil Avan Irundhaan.
21 karththaro Yoseppode Irundhu, Avanmel Kirubai Vaiththu, Siraichchaalaith Thalaivanudaiya Dhayavu Avanukkuk Kidaikkumpadi Seydhaar.
22 siraichchaalaith Thalaivan Siraichchaalaiyil Vaikkappatta Yaavaraiyum Yoseppin Kaiyile Oppuviththaan; Ange Avargal Seyvadhellaavatraiyum Yoseppu Seyviththaan.

23 karththar Avanode Irundhapadiyinaalum, Avan Edhaich Seydhaano Adhaik Karththar Vaaikkappanninapadiyinaalum, Avan Vasamaayirundha Yaadhondraiyum Kuriththuch Siraichchaalaith Thalaivan Visaarikkavillai.
